pages.text: $(li)The Wheat Seeds can be plant in farmland to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat)Wheat$(/l).$(br)$(li)Wheat Seeds can be used to tame $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/parrot)Parrots$(/l).$(br)$(li)Wheat Seeds can be used to bred $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/chicken)Chickens$(/l).

$(li)You can use Wheat Seeds to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Finally you can put Wheat Seeds in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/composter)Composter$(/l) to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l).
